EmailTemplate.name: Lead Reassigned
EmailTemplate.subject: Lead(s) Reassigned Due to Inactivity
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Business Solutions Division Dear {!Receiving_User.Name},
One or more leads have been reassigned due to lack of activity within the first 3 business days of the customer's inquiry. If you contacted the customer previously, the activity was not logged in Salesforce. If you feel this is an error, please contact salesforce@officedepot.com.
Thank you, Sales Operations Team
Helpful links: Salesforce Home Leads Home
